name: Wonderful cooking trip in Cu Chi Tunnels
description:
Exploring the largest number or herbs ,spices how does it use for cooking and Medicine
Exploring and Understanding Whole Vietnamese Agriculture with Cows areas ,Buffallo areas ,mushrooms ,rice fields ,vegetables ,chicken ,duck ,fish ,prawn areas and Lovely fruits areas
Discover The Best healthy cuisine in the world with all organic vegetables and Healthy cooking tips
Making traditional Vietnamese dishes by their owns
Exploring amazing Vietnamese History where 60000 people surviving in American war inside the tunnels for 20 years .You will be suprise and admire how did they construct
